description:
Gokudera and Yamamoto step into the gym to save Chrome, but Belphagor and Mammon have already captured her They approach Gokudera with the proposition to trade Chrome for the rings. Gokudera tries to refuse, but Yamamoto has a plan and gives in to Mammon`s demands. Yamamoto`s quick wits seem to turn the situation around… Meanwhile, Xanxus’ anger grows. The fire he produces has immeasurable power. Tsuna`s technique is not enough to absorb it. Xanxus discards his guns and attacks head on. In response, Tsuna tries to take him on with his flames, but…
Source: crunchyroll
